featured.text: I tried one when I was a prep cook for Next Level Burgers…tasted awful, just like mashed peas gone to rot.

definition.zh_def: 準備，預備，通常指為某個特定目的而做的準備工作或安排。
definition.en_def: To prepare or make ready for a specific purpose or event.
definition.example: I need to prep for the meeting tomorrow.
